description: A sweet combination of pears and meat perfectly matched.
name: Deungshim Ribeye in Bulgogi Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium pear, peeled, cored and diced
2 cloves garlic, peeled and finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 160Â°C. Fry the steaks for 30 seconds on each side on a chargrill on a medium heat.
Combine all the sauce ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. In a casserole dish, place the meat with sauce and bake for 3 hours.
Remove from the oven occasionally and marinade the meat with the juices from the bottom. Serve the meat with the leftover sauce as a dip and garnish with scallions.
